previewArticle.title: Houston Dynamo vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Houston Dynamo 3, Montreal Impact 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Houston Dynamo and Montréal Impact meet for the third time this season in a crucial match for both clubs’ postseason ambitions when they face off Saturday evening at BBVA Compass Stadium.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Houston Dynamo vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Giles Barnes (Houston Dynamo) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal. Assisted by Omar Cummings
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Giles Barnes early attack ends up in Evan Bush's hands

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt saved. Giles Barnes (Houston Dynamo) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Omar Cummings.

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Lepage
timelineItems.text: Sincères sympathies à la famille de @karlouimette qui pleure le départ de Julie, sa soeur. #Imfc #impacttvasports #MLS

timelineItems.name: Rëggë
timelineItems.text: @henregge: Mallace & Felipe. Ca va être compliquer selon moi. On verra bien #IMFC

timelineItems.name: HoustonDynamo
timelineItems.text: 1' We're off! Let's do the soccer! #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Omar Cummings (Houston Dynamo).

timelineItems.name: marcom
timelineItems.text: #imfc glad to see that mallace proving me wrong (so far)

timelineItems.name: nathan bernard
timelineItems.text: Croyez vous que felipe voudra rester avec #imfc meme si il joue pas a son poste habituel ? #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.name: Kevin Duarte
timelineItems.text: In previous games, #HOU would press high with three players. Now rest of the team steps up also. #IMFC needs to play short fast or look long

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Ignacio Piatti.

timelineItems.name: NC
timelineItems.text: Getting there. Slowly but getting there. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Lepage
timelineItems.text: @Alikizi doublure de Bernier? #Imfc #impacttvasports

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Lepage
timelineItems.text: Belle intervention de Romero! On est loin du Romero de 2013! #Imfc #impacttvasports

timelineItems.name: Alex Cayer
timelineItems.text: J'aime bien Di Vaio, mais j'ai hâte de voir autre chose que l'italien qui chiale chaque fois que le ballon ne se rend pas à lui #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by A.J. Cochran (Houston Dynamo).

timelineItems.name: Joe Grish
timelineItems.text: Orange you glad are on their late-season run again? 830pm ET #HOUvMTL http://t.co/vsLvzFyoTm

timelineItems.name: Tim Stoehr
timelineItems.text: Let's go DYNAMO #ForeverOrange #playoffbound http://t.co/7sCHBwWRWN

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: The stars are big and bright. Deep in the coast of Texas. #HOUvMTL is underway: http://t.co/wr8qGgtisn http://t.co/N9V8jk6eCR

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Si Houston veut émerger, il doit tenter de provoquer un peu de panique (fautes et dégagements précipités) dans la défense de #IMFC #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Houston Dynamo 3, Montreal Impact 2.

timelineItems.name: Johan Perdomo
timelineItems.text: Dynamo win! #ForeverOrange

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Tsaboukos
timelineItems.text: Another loss by the #IMFC #theusual

timelineItems.name: Kirsten Heimlich
timelineItems.text: THREE POINTS! #FOREVERORANGE

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @HoustonDynamo complete the comeback. Getting tight in the East playoff picture. http://t.co/sKPzwvdqiw #HOUvMTL http://t.co/JVKhijtZsA

timelineItems.desc: The Houston Dynamo and Montréal Impact met for the third time this season in a crucial match for both clubs’ postseason ambitions when they faced off Saturday evening at BBVA Compass Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Houston Dynamo vs. Montreal Impact | September 6, 2014

timelineItems.name: Bobby
timelineItems.text: The ref is taller than #Bush.. LOL.. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Kevin Duarte
timelineItems.text: Offensively, exactly what I thought would happen. The Dynamo attack down the flanks for eventual crosses. #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.name: HoustonDynamo
timelineItems.text: 21' Corey Ashe beat Marco Di Vaio for a header. #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.name: F.D. Laramée
timelineItems.text: Patrick Bruel n'a pas l'air content d'arbitrer le match de #IMFC ce soir, il grogne tout le temps! :-)

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: I hope everyone is enjoying the clash of the titans. #HOUvsMTL #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: DaMarcus Beasley (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).
Wandrille Lefevre (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Óscar García (Houston Dynamo).

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Lepage
timelineItems.text: Encore une belle intervention de Romero en défense! #Imfc #impacttvasports

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Ricardo Clark (Houston Dynamo) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Ricardo Clark breaks through defense on his own, but cannot put it away

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Houston Dynamo. Conceded by Dilly Duka.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Houston Dynamo 1, Montreal Impact 0. Giles Barnes (Houston Dynamo) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Giles Barnes rushes up the field and rips it in

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Marco Di Vaio amazing chance in front of goal goes just wide

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: F. Klopas devra surveiller ses invectives, l'arbitre est d'origine grecque ce soir. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Andrés Romero with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio fait les bons appels,les passes ne sont pas parfaites mais le dp italien est lent quand même #imfc #dynamo #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Ricardo Clark (Houston Dynamo) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Tyler Deric.

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: The play that summarized these 2 teams' seasons was when Ashe crossed to Barnes in the box. If you saw it, you know it. #HOUvMTL #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Ouf. Barnes n'est pas le seul à avoir pris une tasse de thé sur le jeu... 1-0 #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Bogdan Pasat
timelineItems.text: What an individual effort by Giles. #Goal #HOUvMTL @GilesBarnesReal Houston 1. Expos 0.

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Hum. Bush pas tellement fort là-dessus, non? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: NC
timelineItems.text: Bro Hymn #Dynamo? Bro Hymn, really? Not impressed. #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Óscar García (Houston Dynamo).
Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Corey Ashe.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Barnes. His sixth of the season. @HoustonDynamo up 1-0. #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.name: BOTNSoccer
timelineItems.text: That was a bad mistake from the Impact's back line. #HOUvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: Ferrari instead of complaining for offside call... How about try to stop Barnes from scoring #HorribleDefence #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Marco Di Vaio with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Danny boy
timelineItems.text: Gooooooool #GameDay #ForeverOrange

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Luis Garrido (Houston Dynamo).
Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Bogdan Pasat
timelineItems.text: ICYMI, Barnes touch for the goal was world class. Under pressure - he schooled Bush. #skillz #mad @HoustonDynamo #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.comment: DaMarcus Beasley (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Massimiliano
timelineItems.text: I am convinced I can be the starting goalie for the @impactmontreal .... either get a new goalie or a new goalie coach!! #imfc

timelineItems.comment: DaMarcus Beasley (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: If only #imfc had themselves a halfways decent LB goals like Barnes's wouldn't happen #Dynamo knew exactly where to strike

timelineItems.name: Pilar Espino
timelineItems.text: Diesel in the house!!! #dynamo #houstondynamo #foreverorange #houston #lovethem #mls #futbolenhouston #futbol

timelineItems.name: Darrell Lovell
timelineItems.text: Dynamo are 7-1-3 when they score first. 1-12-0 when they concede first.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: La confiance du Dynamo a augmenté depuis le but et c'est plus difficile pour #IMFC.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Brad Davis (Houston Dynamo) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ricardo Clark.

timelineItems.text: Tea time with @GilesBarnesReal. #HOUvMTL http://t.co/ivW9sXM9UN

timelineItems.comment: Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Óscar García (Houston Dynamo).

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Y a pas que Duka qui a de la difficulté ce soir, Krol en arrache pas mal aussi. Ferrari vient de lui sauver les fesses. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Omar Cummings (Houston Dynamo) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: If MLS is all about parity then this game is its best ambassador #imfc #dynamo #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: Krol struggling. Earth is round. Montreal's roads are full of potholes. All is normal. #IMFC #SomeThingsNeverChange

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Dilly Duka does it. @impactmontreal pulls even with @HoustonDynamo. #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Felipe?! With a good, final pass?! What is this demonry? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Dunlop
timelineItems.text: Lol 0 célébration #imfc #duka

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Juste une théorie, aucune célébration simplement par respect pour la soeur de Karl. Je peux évidemment être très à côté de la plaque. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Tyler Deric.

timelineItems.name: Mladen Palaic
timelineItems.text: "@RonWaxman: @mpalaic Do not give up on #IMFC. They are about to go on a roll." You are a prophet

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
David Horst (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Omar Cummings (Houston Dynamo) shoots from inside the box, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Omar Cummings bends it just past the far post from short distance

timelineItems.name: Darrell Lovell
timelineItems.text: Way too much space for Duka at the top of the box. Good movement by him to find it and capitalize.

timelineItems.text: 1-1 at the half. Dynamo concede five minutes before half after controlling the game.

timelineItems.name: cesar platero
timelineItems.text: just here watching the #houstondynamo#foreverorange

timelineItems.text: Beasley wanted the foul but ref wasn't having it.

timelineItems.text: Le #imfc a changé depuis la venue de Piatti , belle acquisition de Desantis! #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.text: Houston Dynamo need this W. Backs have been against the wall for a while. Home games have not been kind or fun. #HOUvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact).
Corey Ashe (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: The Grizzz
timelineItems.text: Pour devancer @patleduc15 , à la question "Piatti scoré?", la réponse est oui. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: If that were me, I'd be lying on the ground, probably dead, four Dynamo players surveying my corpse. Well played, Piatti.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Ignacio Piatti.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: BUUUUUUUUUT! @impactmontreal take the lead as Ignacio Piatti pulls away from the @HoustonDynamo defense. #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Giles Barnes (Houston Dynamo) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Omar Cummings with a headed pass.

Foul by Óscar García (Houston Dynamo).

timelineItems.name: Bryan Williams
timelineItems.text: What a run by Piatti! An interesting take on instant classic #obaflips, diving somersault off being tackled... #IMFC #HOUvMTL #Piattiflips

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Il ne faut pas s'inquiéter pour Ferrari, ce n'est que du repos, pas de blessure. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Bryan Williams
timelineItems.text: Always nice to see a team's stars connect #IMFC

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: It's not delivery it's Romero. #IMFC #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Diego Pinzón
timelineItems.text: Mientras tanto, Montreal Impact es un equipo completamente diferente con Ignacio Piatti. ¡Qué jugador! Quizás llegó un poco tarde. #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: God bless Nick De Santis' contacts in Argentina. #Piatti #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Luc Pelot
timelineItems.text: On est en droit de penser qu'arriver plutôt en saison #Piatti aurait peut-être permis à #IMFC de faire les séries.

timelineItems.comment: Giles Barnes (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Lefèvre battu au marquage, mais Cummings n'aurait jamais dû avoir le temps de faire cette passe. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Omar Cummings (Houston Dynamo) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Ricardo Clark.

timelineItems.text: Les coups francs de Davis et le jeu de tête de Clark : principales menaces dont doit se méfier #IMFC lors de #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: L'axe du jeu : origine de bien des maux défensifs à Houston, et d'accélérations dangereuses de Montréal. À surveiller lors de #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.name: Eric Truong
timelineItems.text: Dynamo Pregame #foreverorange #clubseats

timelineItems.name: Kelly sandill
timelineItems.text: Go Dynamo! #foreverorange #texinarmy http://t.co/HMyP0Y88Hh

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Tras ser elegido Latino de la Jornada, Ignacio Piatti visita al @HoustonDynamo: http://t.co/nm9oHtmNbt #HOUvMTL http://t.co/UIwaInEFgP

timelineItems.name: Darrell Lovell
timelineItems.text: Big night for Omar Cummings. Has been out the past two games for personal reasons. Will be called on to pick up attack.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. DaMarcus Beasley (Houston Dynamo) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Óscar García.

timelineItems.name: Pilar Espino
timelineItems.text: 3-2 Dynamo. Let's go!!! #houstondynamo #houston #foreverorange #futbolenhouston

timelineItems.name: Jesse Bailon
timelineItems.text: Forever Orange!! #lilboycandance #tookhishsirtoffandeverything #bringyourbabytodynamogame #startthemyoung #foreverorange #dynamo

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Houston Dynamo. Giles Barnes tries a through ball, but DaMarcus Beasley is caught offside.
Foul by Luis Garrido (Houston Dynamo).
Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Darrell Lovell
timelineItems.text: Rico Clark played that ball while carrying his helmet.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Handball... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: This was a winnable game. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Benoit Quintal
timelineItems.text: C'est drôle a dire, mais l'impact doit garder ses joueurs mauvais. Ce sont eux qu'on ne protégera pas pour le repêchage d'expansion. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Coming back to the hand ball, it was a clear handball and a PK. Mtl was cheated on that play #imfc #dynamo #HOUvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Brian Ownby (Houston Dynamo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Roger Arteaga
timelineItems.text: Buckle up this is going to be a wild ride #ForeverOrange #playoffrace

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Comme je l'ai souvent dit. 4 minutes de temps ajouté, c'est la règle en MLS. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Houston Dynamo. A.J. Cochran tries a through ball, but Giles Barnes is caught offside.
Second Half ends, Houston Dynamo 3, Montreal Impact 2.
